frontmatter.title: Secure and Private 'Dating' System
frontmatter.excerpt: Dating applications are widely adopted all over the world. However, most of them do not have a very good security and privacy guarantee. On one hand, who's confessing love to whom is not something secret to the service provider. On the other hand, if the target user B of user A refuses the request, severe embarrassment will be caused in between them. In this project, we aimed to tackle these two issues. We proposed a preliminary cryptography protocol for this and developed a WeChat MiniApp on top of this scheme.
